endpoints.description: Retrieve a list of safety and regulatory compliance checks performed on specific products or product categories.
Retrieve current alerts and historical data related to detected contaminants or potential hazards in food supplies.
Submit product data for analysis, allowing the service to evaluate ingredient safety and compliance status.
Check the compliance status and any active alerts related to a specific product by its ID.
Access and manage recall lists, view status, and obtain detailed recall information.
Submit a request to initiate a product recall process after detecting a significant hazard.
Update information and status of an ongoing product recall effort, ensuring consistent communication with affected parties.
Fetch detailed standards and guidelines for ensuring ingredient safety and compliance with regulations across different regions.
Submit new or modified product information for a comprehensive risk evaluation, producing alerts for potential contamination risks.
Retrieve past notifications and current alerts sent to the user concerning product safety and regulatory issues.
